Error: browserType.launch: Target page, context or browser has been closed
Browser logs:

╔════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║ Looks like you launched a headed browser without having a XServer running.                     ║

For each transaction, add the value in the "total" field
